name: Full-Stack Web Development
body:
#### If you have account issues, let your instructors know!

# Chat
* https://uafasra.slack.com/

# Tools We Use
* https://c9.io/
* https://codepen.io/team/ASRA
* https://github.com/uafasra
* https://hyperdev.com/

# Terminology
* https://quizlet.com/_2ee0kt

# Resources & References

## Frontend

### HTML
* http://www.htmldog.com/guides/html/
* http://www.w3schools.com/html/default.asp
* https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML
* http://marksheet.io/html-basics.html
* http://learn.shayhowe.com/
* http://www.tutorialspoint.com/html/index.htm
* http://www.tutorialspoint.com/html5/index.htm

### CSS
* http://www.htmldog.com/guides/css/
* http://www.w3schools.com/css/default.asp
* https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS
* http://marksheet.io/css-basics.html
* http://learn.shayhowe.com/
* http://www.tutorialspoint.com/css/index.htm

### JavaScript
* http://www.htmldog.com/guides/javascript/
* http://www.w3schools.com/js/default.asp
* https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript
* http://jsforcats.com/
* http://learn-js.org/
* http://www.crunchzilla.com/code-maven
* http://eloquentjavascript.net/
* http://eloquentjavascript.net/code/
* http://javascriptissexy.com/how-to-learn-javascript-properly/
* http://www.tutorialspoint.com/javascript/index.htm

## Backend

### Node
* http://www.tutorialspoint.com/nodejs/index.htm
* http://eloquentjavascript.net/20_node.html
* https://egghead.io/courses/introduction-to-node-the-fundamentals
* https://github.com/maxogden/art-of-node#the-art-of-node
* https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8aGhZQkoFbQ
* Express (Node Framework)
  * https://github.com/expressjs/express/tree/master/examples
  * https://egghead.io/courses/getting-started-with-express-js
  * https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGquJ_T_JBMTpKQptCmBDM9HcYrptCV0Z
  * https://coderbyte.com/course/learn-back-end-development/
  * https://scotch.io/tutorials/build-a-restful-api-using-node-and-express-4
* MongoDB (Database)
  * http://www.tutorialspoint.com/mongodb/
  * https://scotch.io/tutorials/using-mongoosejs-in-node-js-and-mongodb-applications
  * https://github.com/madhums/node-express-mongoose-demo
  * https://github.com/sahat/hackathon-starter
* Other
  * http://passportjs.org/
  * https://caolan.github.io/async/
  * http://socket.io/
  * http://bluebirdjs.com/docs/getting-started.html
  * https://www.rethinkdb.com/

# Full Interactive Curriculums
**These require accounts (free to sign up).**
* https://www.freecodecamp.com/
  * Click "Map" to see the lessons offered.
* https://www.khanacademy.org/computing
  * Click "Computer programming" to learn HTML/CSS/JavaScript.
* https://www.codecademy.com/
  * Scroll to the bottom-right of the page to see all lessons offered.

# Free Online Classes
**These require accounts (free to sign up).** 
* https://www.udacity.com/courses/all
  * Check the boxes on the left to find free courses.
* https://www.udemy.com/courses/development/all-courses/?price=price-free&lang=en
  * Refine search on the left to find specific topics.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
